Event.name: Seeking_to_achieve
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> intends and takes steps towards bringing about a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or, metonymically, towards acquiring a <fen>Sought_entity</fen> .
<ex><fex name="age">Libya</fex> <t>sought</t> <fex name="sou">nuclear weapons</fex> <fex name="Time">in the 1960s</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="age">North Korea</fex> <t>sought</t> <fex name="sou">several billion dollars in cash from the US</fex> <fex name="Time">during bilateral missile talks</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The talks in Berlin ended without agreement after <fex name="age">Bora Bora</fex> <t>sought</t> <fex name="soa">to link large-scale economic assistance to joint recovery operations</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">India</fex> had <t>sought</t> <fex name="soa">her extradition</fex> <fex name="exp">for forging documents to procure a passport</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or to obtain a <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="age">Those states</fex> <t>sought</t> a remedy that would substantially change the company's business practices.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Sought_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity that the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to acquire.
<ex>Or the monstrous Saddam, who filled mass graves to bursting, invaded two neighboring countries, and avidly <t>sought</t> <fex name="sou">weapons of mass destruction</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt to acquire a <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex>WWDA also <fex name="out">successfully</fex> <t>sought</t> funding from Office of the Status of Women</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt at achieving a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or at acquiring the <fen>Sought_entity</fen> is made.
<ex>Agassi <t>sought</t> relief <fex name="Means">by taking Advil</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the amount of effort put into an attempt.
<ex>He also <t>sought</t> <fex name="Degr">intensely</fex> to know more of Christ.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the <fen>Agent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> is seeking to achieve a particular <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or to acquire a <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex>The disclosure came as prosecutors successfully <t>sought</t> <fex name="Place">in federal court</fex> to keep Luise Garofalo behind bars.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the attempt.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time period over which the attempts at achieving a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or acquiring the <fen>Sought_entity</fen> take place.
<ex>Finally the peace I've <t>sought</t> <fex name="Duration">for years</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by bringing about a particular <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or acquiring the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: State_of_affairs
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A state or event that the <fen>Agent</fen> wants to bring about. The Agent may but need not be a participant in that <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
<ex> His enemies <t>sought</t> <fex name="soa">his destruction</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A proposition from which the occurrence of the seeking event follows.
<ex>About 6% of all abortions are <t>sought</t> <fex name="exp">because either the woman or fetus has medical reasons</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An individual or organization that helps the <fen>Agent</fen> bring about the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> or delivers the <fen>Sought_entity</fen> to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>He has lain that way ever since and has given power to all who <t>sought</t> it <fex name="src">from him</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE introduces the underlying situation(s) in which seeking occurs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Beneficiary
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE applies to participants that derive a benefit from the <fen>Sought_entity</fen> or <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> .
<ex>Jed <t>sought</t> the world's largest diamond <fex name="Beneficiary">for his Jeda</fex> .</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: seek.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take steps towards obtaining an entity or bringing about a state of affairs
